radiographic_examinations.findings: cardiothoracic ratio of 60% to 65% and pulmonary hilar congestion.
an aneurysm of the anterior mitral leaflet causing moderate to severe mitral regurgitation.
an aneurysm of the anterior mitral leaflet with the mouth of the aneurysm in communication with the left ventricle.
anterior mitral leaflet aneurysm with severe mitral regurgitation.
2 ground-glass opacities: 1 corresponded to a 0.5-cm previously undetected lesion in the right lower lobe, and the other corresponded to a 0.7-cm stationary lesion in the left lower lobe.
